entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.0°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Periods of freezing rain inland overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast in the morning. Fog patches. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
